title: Engineering Modeling and Simulation Inquiry-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering principles and physics, along with fundamental computer literacy
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited technological environments, verifying learning effectiveness through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Select appropriate modeling techniques to solve engineering problems and implement them using simulation tools (mobile-compatible programs such as PhET).
Analyze simulation results to predict system behavior and compare/contrast differences with real-world phenomena.
Complete a project applying the engineering design process through collaboration (e.g., bridges/circuits) and prepare a final report.

resources: Mobile-Friendly Simulation Tools (PhET, MATLAB Mobile, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
